#
Check
the
existing
access
scopes
gcloud
compute
instances
describe
[
INSTANCE_NAME
]
--format json
#
The
above
command
returns
the
service
account
information
.
For
example
:
"serviceAccounts"
:
[
{
"email": "your.gserviceaccount.com",
"scopes": [
"https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform",
"https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.email"
]
}
]
,
#
Stop
the
VM
,
then
run
the
following
command
,
using
the
service
account
#
that
gcloud
returned
when
you
checked
the
scopes
.
gcloud
compute
instances
set
-
service
-
account
[
INSTANCE_NAME
]
--service-account "your.gserviceaccount.com" --scopes "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/firebase.database,https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.email"
